meanings.definition: Make practical and effective use of.
meanings.sent1: She utilised her time wisely by studying for the exam.
meanings.sent2: The farmer utilised the land to grow crops for his family.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel utilised its quick reflexes to escape from the chasing cat.
meanings.sent4: The detective utilised his keen observation skills to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The chef utilised fresh ingredients to create a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: Put to use; turn to profitable account.
meanings.sent1: He utilised his savings to buy a new car.
meanings.sent2: The company utilised the latest technology to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The magician utilised his tricks to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: The athlete utilised his speed to win the race.
meanings.sent5: The artist utilised different colors to create a beautiful painting.
